fields.description:
h5. description
after doing a list view search then clicking on overlay it is not shown. 

h5. how to reproduce
Run attached project
Go to  ListView 
Without search, when clicked on "ShowLoading" a Yellow view is overlaid on top of the list view Search for "Data1" 
When clicked on "ShowLoading" a Yellow view is not overlaid on top of the list view with search results. 

h5. Project
 [^LIstViewSearchOverlaingOnOtherView.zip] 

h5. Additional information 
customer has a pending release and is asking for an urgent fix/ workaround
fields.summary: iOS: After Listview Search overlay not appearing
fields.environment:
Xcode version= 9.2
iOS version= 11.2
JDK = 1.8.0_121
node= 8.9.3
Mac OS X 
Version 10.12.6
64 bit
8 CPUs
16GB of memory
CLI 5.0.14

comments.body:
Hi,
I did some workaround and updated the app folder as attached app.zip. Please replace the attached project's app folder with attached 'app' folder. 
"Rather using Widget in list view , create a  Window with all widget data and open/close as per need. Please find  updated code inside attached "app.zip"."

Let me know, if this works for you. Thanks!

[~vijaysingh] I've shared this with the customer and will let you know if this works for them 
Thank you

Consolidated Test Cases can be found here -
https://gist.github.com/vijaysingh-axway/e76b9451c2ae87c76fc9df707385cdac

Verified fix is found in:
SDK 7.0.2.v20180124113923
SDK 7.1.0.v20180124115505
